Articles.Content: When I try to run ksp 1.3 I only have black screen with a white line on the left side. That's what I've done: I downloaded ksp 1.3 from safari and firefox (I tried both), then I downloaded kspinstaller1.3.0.pkg from firefox 'cause in safari it says "server migration" and it doesn't work. I installed KSP following the installer instructions (differently from the older versions it didn't let me drag ksp in the application folder, don't know if it is normal) and I tried to run ksp. I noticed (if it could be useful) that there's not any KSP.log file in my ksp folder but maybe it should have create with the first run, don't know (anyway it didn't do that). Sorry for my English but I'm Italian I hope you will be able to understand.

On 8/25/2017 at 3:54 AM, Riccardo Amadio said:

When I try to run ksp 1.3 I only have black screen with a white line on the left side. That's what I've done: I downloaded ksp 1.3 from safari and firefox (I tried both), then I downloaded kspinstaller1.3.0.pkg from firefox 'cause in safari it says "server migration" and it doesn't work. I installed KSP following the installer instructions (differently from the older versions it didn't let me drag ksp in the application folder, don't know if it is normal) and I tried to run ksp. I noticed (if it could be useful) that there's not any KSP.log file in my ksp folder but maybe it should have create with the first run, don't know (anyway it didn't do that). Sorry for my English but I'm Italian I hope you will be able to understand. 

I'm assuming this is on OSX given you mentioned safari.
Can you submit a log from the game trying to startup. Otherwise no one is going to be able to help you.
See this post for information on where and how to gather the log files and supply them.
I think that ↓ is what @JPLRepo was trying to link
